SEARCH
Package gw.bizrules

Interface ITriggeringPoint

public interface ITriggeringPoint
An object passed to gw.bizrules.BizRulesExecutor#trigger(gw.bizrules.ITriggeringPoint) which defines which rules should be executed, and generates IRuleContexts to be used when executing those rules

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    List<IRuleContext>
    generateContexts(RuleContextDefinitionKey contextDefinitionKey)
    Generates a list of IRuleContext for a given RuleContextDefinitionKey.
    TriggeringPointKey
    getKey()
    the 'firing' triggering point Only rules defined using this TriggeringPointKey will be fired when using this ITriggeringPoint
    Predicate<RuleVersion>
    getRuleApplicabilityPredicate()
    Creates a predicate to test whether a Rule of a RuleVersion matches the applicability criteria defined by the base context of this triggering point.
    Set<RuleContextDefinitionKey>
    supportedContexts()
    Which contexts this triggering point is capable of generating.

  • Method Details

    • getKey

      TriggeringPointKey getKey()
      the 'firing' triggering point Only rules defined using this TriggeringPointKey will be fired when using this ITriggeringPoint

    • supportedContexts

      Set<RuleContextDefinitionKey> supportedContexts()
      Which contexts this triggering point is capable of generating. A subset of RuleContextDefinitionKeys associated with this ITriggeringPoint's TriggeringPointKey in gw.bizrules.IBizRulesPlugin#getTriggeringPointMap() Only rules defined using these contexts will be fired when using this ITriggeringPoint

    • generateContexts

      List<IRuleContext> generateContexts(RuleContextDefinitionKey contextDefinitionKey)
      Generates a list of IRuleContext for a given RuleContextDefinitionKey. Each context must have values for each symbol defined in that key's associated IRuleContextDefinition (registered for the corresponding RuleContextDefinitionKey in gw.bizrules.IBizRulesPlugin#getTriggeringPointMap())
      Parameters:
      contextDefinitionKey - key for which to generate contexts
      Returns:
      a list of contexts for this key

    • getRuleApplicabilityPredicate

      Predicate<RuleVersion> getRuleApplicabilityPredicate()
      Creates a predicate to test whether a Rule of a RuleVersion matches the applicability criteria defined by the base context of this triggering point.
      Returns:
      a Predicate on a RuleVersion that matches the applicability criteria on the latter's Rule for the base context of this triggering point.
